extensionDescription.message: Velg tekst p√• en nettside, og har datamaskinen lese den h√∏yt for deg ved √• klikke p√• Talkie knappen.
extensionDescription.original: Select text on any web page, and have the computer read it out loud for you by simply clicking the Talkie button.

frontend_aboutThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie - if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_donate_alreadyHavePremium.original: You already have Talkie üåü Premium. Your continued support is already enough ‚Äî thank you!

frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Koden er √•pen kildekode og gratis tilgjengelig for alle brukere.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and available for free to all users.

frontend_featuresHeading.original: Features: what Talkie is good at

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own default voice for each language. Great if you get tired of the system voice!

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Velg lesehastigheten og toneh√∏yde per stemme. Juster snakker hastigheten til din smak!
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Choose reading rate and pitch per voice. Adjust speaking speed to your liking!

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: At varm og god f√∏lelse du f√•r n√•r st√∏tte √•pen kildekode av uavhengige utviklere.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.message: Rimelig pris. Fremtidige Premium oppdateringer inkludert gratis.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Affordable price. Future Premium updates included for free.

frontend_featuresVersion_Free.message: Du bruker n√• gratisversjonen av Talkie , og et begrenset sett av funksjoner er tilgjengelig for deg. Kanskje Talkie üåü Premium ville v√¶re et bedre valg for deg?
frontend_featuresVersion_Free.original: You are currently using the free version of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available to you. Perhaps Talkie üåü Premium would be a better choice for you?

frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.message: Du er n√• inne premiumversjonen av Talkie , og alle funksjoner er tilgjengelige for deg. Tusen takk, det varmer mitt hjerte!
frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.original: You are currently using the premium version of Talkie, and all features are available to you. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresVersions.message: Talkie kommer i to versjoner: Talkie gratis og Talkie üåü Premium . Den gratis versjonen er flott for de fleste bruksm√•ter, men premien versjonen tilbyr flere alternativer.
frontend_featuresVersions.original: Talkie comes in two versions: Talkie Free and Talkie üåü Premium. The free version is great for most use cases, but the premium version offers additional options.

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopup.original: Hide donation buttons in the popup

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Det er ikke som jeg ikke vil at du skal f√• Talkie üåü Premium eller donere til √• st√∏tte Talkie og √•pen kildekode generelt - Jeg vil ikke at du skal v√¶re irritert n√•r du bruker Talkie i f√∏rste omgang. Hvis du deaktiverer donasjon knappene i popup, h√•per jeg at du ogs√• vil st√∏tte Talkie p√• noen m√•te! Knappene vil alltid v√¶re tilgjengelig her blant alternativene, bare i tilfelle.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie üåü Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general - I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Alle bidrag til Talkie er gjort under den bidragsyter License Agreement (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie ble utviklet noen dager f√∏r nytt√•r 2016/2017, p√• en utfordring fra en venn. Utfordringen startet med sp√∏rsm√•let: mens du pendler til arbeid, er det mulig √• lytte til en artikkel i stedet for √• lese den? Enkel, sa jeg, og satt ut for √• bevise det - eller i det minste √• gj√∏re nettleseren min snakke ut tekst ved hjelp av en dum datastemme. Den grunnleggende versjonen, uten noen brukergrensesnittet, viste seg √• v√¶re trivielt √• lage. Legge til et brukergrensesnitt, tok litt lenger. Legge til rette spr√•kgjenkjenning en haug mer kode. Overvinne bugs i nettleseren enda mer arbeid. Listen over forbedringer og funksjoner g√•r videre - og noen tusen linjer med kode senere, du ser p√• sluttresultatet.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it - or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on - and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyHeading.message: Story: hvordan Talkie kom i gang

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Du kan ogs√• velge teksten, deretter h√∏yreklikk p√• den og velg Talkie i menyen. P√• denne m√•ten fungerer ogs√• i PDF-filer og noen spesielle typer sider i Chrome.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in Chrome.

frontend_voicesDescription.original: Here you can see and test installed voices for each language in your browser. üåü Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as change rate and pitch for each voice.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by Chrome Extensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie f√•r ikke tilgang til den markerte teksten fra denne typen siden. Det er en veldig spesiell side, og det er sikkerhetsbegrensninger satt i av nettleseren. Du kan ogs√• pr√∏ve √• velge tekst, og deretter h√∏yreklikk p√• den og velg Talkie i menyen. Jeg beklager bryet.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
